message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $9,500 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $7,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're willing to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8,250. Can you consider that?
